name: TheNarayana Inc
overview:
Established in the year 2008, we, “The Narayana Inc”, are engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a collection of Precious & Semi-Precious Gemstones and Beads. The stones we offer are cut and polished using advanced technology tools and equipment. Our products are used to decorate jewelry and ornaments. These stones and beads we offer are applauded for their attributes such as smooth edges, lustrous appeal, excellent shine, perfect cuts, attractive looks, eye-catching colors, smooth surface, long lasting shine and lightweight.

Our Quality Assurance: Since establishment, we work hard to offer flawless assortment of Precious & Semi-Precious Gemstones and Beads to the clients. Our collection is available in a plethora of designs, shapes and colors in order to fulfill the variegated demands of our patrons. The stones & beads offered by us stand equivalent with style, glamor, trend and fashion.

Our Infrastructure: We have established a sound and sophisticated infrastructure facility, which spreads over a large area. The unit is divided into various sections like designing, quality checking and administrative. These departments are equipped with the latest tools and equipment, essential in manufacturing Precious & Semi-Precious Gemstones and Beads.

Our Team: Designers Market researchers Craftsmen and artisans Finishing and polishing experts Quality controllers Packaging experts

Warehousing and Packaging: We are backed by a capacious warehouse, which is spread over a vast area and helps us in storing all our products in an organized manner. It is internally divided into various section that enable us to store all the products under specific categories. We also have a team of warehousing experts, which manages the department properly.
